original_text: And it shall come to pass, that thy choicest valleys shall be full of chariots, and the horsemen shall set themselves in array at the gate.
korean_text: 병거는 네 아름다운 골짜기에 가득하였고 마병은 성문에 정렬되었도다

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass,
that thy choicest valleys shall be full of chariots,
sentences.korean_translation: 네 가장 좋은 골짜기들이 전차로 가득 찰 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and the horsemen shall set themselves in array
